thread.title: Family's lifesaving milestone for Sussex schoolchildren
thread.title_full: Family's lifesaving milestone for Sussex schoolchildren | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Family's lifesaving milestone for Sussex schoolchildren
text:
Teenager Connor Saunders died after just one punch during a night out with friends.
Within hours, the 19-year-old from Sussex had saved the lives of five other people through organ donation.
In the days and weeks that followed Connor's family decided they wanted that legacy of life-saving to continue, setting up the Connor Saunders Foundation to provide first aid training and heart defibrillators to schools.
Today the Foundation has reached a milestone - installing its 50th defibrillator. John Ryall reports.
Play video Last updated Mon 27 Feb 2017 Health Sussex
